General.Name: Hunt Electronic Co Ltd
General.Description: Hunt Electronic Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells surveillance equipment in Taiwan. Its products include network cameras, such as explosion-proof, anti-corrosion IP, thermal IP, traffic, speed dome, fisheye, bullet, vandal dome, fixed dome, box, and cube cameras; AI thermal IP cameras; and portable camera and related software. The company also provides 4G LTE cameras; video server products; recorders; and software products and applications. Hunt Electronic Co., Ltd. was founded in 1988 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 171, Datong Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 22183
